(?:^|/)(?i)COPYRIGHT
(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
/Cargo\.toml$
/go\.sum$
ignore$
pem$
\.avi$
\.drawio$
\.ico$
\.jpe?g$
\.lock$
\.map$
\.min\..
\.mod$
\.mp[34]$
\.patch$
\.png$
\.wav$
^\.github/
^\Q.mailmap\E$
^\Qpackages/ca-certificates/ca-certificates-tmpfiles.conf\E$
^\Qpackages/ecs-agent/pause-repositories\E$
^\Qpackages/host-ctr/host-containerd-tmpfiles.conf\E$
^\Qpackages/libbzip2/bzip2.pc.in\E$
^\Qpackages/oci-add-hooks/Cargo.toml\E$
^\Qpackages/open-vm-tools/tools.conf\E$
^\Qpackages/selinux-policy/processes.cil\E$
^\Qpackages/selinux-policy/sockets.cil\E$
^\Qpackages/systemd/systemd-modules-load.conf\E$
^\Qpackages/util-linux/util-linux.spec\E$
^\Qsources/api/migration/migrator/tests/data/expired-root.json\E$
